59f3aff28bf5501e050f3368.name: Dark Matter
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3368.description: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3368.tooltip:
After 1.2 seconds, dark matter falls from the sky to the target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Every 50 stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown by 10% (currently {{ f2.0*100 }}%).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3412.name: Stranglethorns
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3412.description: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3412.tooltip:
Summons the fury of nature, growing a twisted thicket at target location which deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area as it expands. After 2 seconds, the vines snap upward knocking enemies into the air for {{ e1 }} second.

Garden of Thorns: Plants within the thicket are enraged, attacking in a flurry for 150% total damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3389.name: Eye Of The Storm
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3389.description: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3389.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion or turret for {{ e3 }} seconds. The shield absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage and grants {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Attack Damage until it breaks.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f342b.name: Hate Spike
59f3aff28bf5501e050f342b.description: Evelynn fires a line of spikes through an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f342b.tooltip:
Evelynn fires a line of spikes through a nearby enemy dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in its path.

Hate Spike prioritizes the target Evelynn is attacking.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3337.name: Piltover Peacemaker
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3337.description: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3337.tooltip:
Revs the rifle for {{ e4 }} second to fire a narrow piercing shot dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. After hitting any target, it opens into a wider shot that deals {{ e2 }}% less damage.

Always deals full damage to trap revealed targets.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f342c.name: Dark Frenzy
59f3aff28bf5501e050f342c.description: Evelynn passively increases her Movement Speed when hitting enemy champions with her spells. Upon activation, Evelynn breaks free from slows affecting her and gains a massive Movement Speed boost for a short duration.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f342c.tooltip:
Active: Evelynn removes all slows affecting her and gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Passive: Evelynn's spell hits on enemy champions reduce Dark Frenzy's cooldown by 1 second.

Champion kills and assists refresh Dark Frenzy's cooldown.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3278.name: Bellows Breath
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3278.description: Ornn advances unstoppably, breathing fire and shielding himself. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3278.tooltip:
Ornn stomps forwards unstoppably, breathing fire and shielding himself for {{ f5 }} (12% max health) for {{ e5 }} seconds. The fire deals up to {{ e0 }}% of the enemy's current health as magic damage (minimum {{ e3 }}).

Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle for {{ f9 }} seconds. The next immobilizing effect against a Brittle enemy has its duration increased by 30% and deals {{ f8 }}% of their max health as magic damage.

16

59f3aff28bf5501e050f342d.name: Ravage
59f3aff28bf5501e050f342d.description: Evelynn slashes her target twice, dealing damage with each hit. She then gains increased Attack Speed for a short duration.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f342d.tooltip:
Evelynn swiftly attacks a target {{ e3 }} times (applies on-hit effects), dealing a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Evelynn then gains {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e5.name: Shifting Sands
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e5.description: Azir dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he gains a shield.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e5.tooltip:
Azir shields himself for {{ e6 }} seconds, blocking up to {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies hit for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

If Azir hits an enemy champion, he halts his dash and instantly prepares a new Sand Soldier.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f326c.name: Turtle Stance
59f3aff18bf5501e050f326c.description: Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for 2.5% of his maximum health.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f326c.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e4 }}% of his maximum health), increasing by 1% for every percent of Udyr's missing health.

Activation: Gains a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3438.name: Soul Furnace
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3438.description: Sion shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When Sion kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3438.tooltip:
Passive: Sion gains {{ e5 }} maximum Health when he kills a unit ({{ e6 }} for champion kills, assists, large minions and large monsters). Current Bonus: {{ f1 }}

Active: Sion shields himself for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) ({{ e3 }}% of maximum Health) for 6 seconds. After {{ e7 }} seconds, while the shield holds, Sion can reactivate to deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e4 }}% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage to nearby enemies. Max 400 bonus damage to minions and monsters.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f342e.name: Agony's Embrace
59f3aff28bf5501e050f342e.description: Evelynn summons spikes from the ground to deal damage and slow enemies in the area. She then gains a shield based on how many enemy champions were hit.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f342e.tooltip:
Evelynn impales all enemies in the targeted area, dealing {{ f1 }}% [{{ e1 }}% + {{ f2 }}% per 100 ability power] of each target's current health as magic damage and slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Evelynn siphons their pain, gaining a {{ e4 }} health shield for each enemy champion hit which lasts up to {{ e6 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3448.name: Brutal Strikes
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3448.description: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3448.tooltip:
Passive: Malphite's armor is increased by {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}). While Granite Shield is active, this bonus is tripled to {{ f4.0 }}% ({{ f3 }}).

Active: Basic attacks deal an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and nearby enemies. Lasts {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3279.name: Searing Charge
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3279.description: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3279.tooltip:
Ornn charges, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }})(+{{ f3 }}) physical damage to enemies hit.

If Ornn rams into terrain, the resulting shockwave will deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }})(+{{ f3 }}) physical damage and knock up enemies for {{ e6 }} second.

16

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37bb.name: Tailwind
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37bb.description: Increases the Movement Speed of all allied champions moving towards Janna by 8%.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e4.name: Shadow Walk
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e4.description: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Camouflage only being able to be seen by nearby enemy champions or Control Wards. While Camouflaged, she rapidly regenerates Mana.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b5a.name: Nomad's Medallion
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b5a.description:
+50% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Enemy minions killed by your allies sometimes drop coins that give either 40 gold or 10% missing mana (minimum 15). Cannon minions always drop coins.
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item.
REWARD: Favor is upgraded to Emperor's Favor and allied champions moving toward you gain 8% movement speed.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

''The medallion shines with the glory of a thousand voices when exposed to the sun.'' - Historian Shurelya, 22 June, 24 CLE

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b33.name: Sterak's Gage
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b33.description:
+400 Health
+30% Base Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive - Lifeline: Upon taking at least 400 to 1800 damage (based on level) within 5 seconds, gain a shield for 75% of your bonus Health that decays over 3 seconds (60 second cooldown).

Sterak's Fury: When Lifeline triggers, grow in size and strength, gaining +30% additional Base Attack Damage for 8 seconds.

59f3af898bf5501e050f2b72.name: Talisman of Ascension
59f3af898bf5501e050f2b72.description:
+45 Armor
+175% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Point Runner: Builds up to +20% Movement Speed over 2 seconds while near turrets, fallen turrets and Void Gates.
UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Enemy minions killed by your allies sometimes drop coins that give either 40 gold or 10% missing mana (minimum 15). Cannon minions always drop coins.
UNIQUE Active: Grants nearby allies +40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds (60 second cooldown).
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item.
REWARD: Favor is upgraded to Emperor's Favor and allied champions moving toward you gain 8% movement speed.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

''Praise the sun.'' - Historian Shurelya, 22 September, 25 CLE

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b5b.name: Spellthief's Edge
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b5b.description:
+5 Ability Power
+2 Gold per 10 seconds
+25% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive - Tribute: Damaging spells and attacks against champions or buildings deal 10 additional magic damage and grant 8 Gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds. Killing minions slows Tribute generation.
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item and upgrade to Frostfang.
REWARD: Tribute is upgraded into Queen's Tribute.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

59f3af898bf5501e050f2b71.name: Ardent Censer
59f3af898bf5501e050f2b71.description:
+60 Ability Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+50% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive: +10% Heal and Shield Power
UNIQUE Passive: +8% Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive: Whenever you heal or shield an ally, you and your ally gain 20% - 35% Attack Speed and your attacks deal an additional 20 - 35 on-hit damage for 6 seconds.

This does not include regeneration effects. Bonus effects are based on target's level.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b35.name: Jaurim's Fist
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b35.description:
+15 Attack Damage
+150 Health

UNIQUE Passive: Killing a unit grants 5 maximum Health. This bonus stacks up to 30 times.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b5c.name: Ancient Coin
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b5c.description:
+5% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Enemy minions killed by your allies sometimes drop coins that give either 25 gold or 10% missing mana (minimum 15). Cannon minions always drop coins.
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item and upgrade to Nomad's Medallion.
REWARD: Favor is upgraded to Emperor's Favor and allied champions moving toward you gain 8% movement speed.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

''Gold dust rises from the desert and clings to the coin.'' - Historian Shurelya, 11 November, 23 CLE

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b56.name: Eye of the Oasis
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b56.description:
+200 Health
+125% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Enemy minions killed by your allies sometimes drop coins that give either 40 gold or 10% missing mana (minimum 15). Cannon minions always drop coins.
UNIQUE Active - Warding: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 150 seconds. Holds up to 4 charges which refill upon visiting the shop
QUEST: Earn 650 gold using this item.
REWARD: Favor is upgraded to Emperor's Favor and allied champions moving toward you gain 8% movement speed.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.
